title: Aru bAraru
sahitya:
Aru bAraru sankaTarobbaru nArAyaNa divyanAma ondallade


caraNam 1    hottu navamAsa pariyanta garbhadali atyanta nOvu benegaLa tindu 
tuttu buddhiya koTTu salahida tAyiyu attu kaLuhuvaLallade sankaTa bAraLu
    caraNam 2    neredidda purajana viprarigniya sAkSi karaviDidu kaidhAre erasikoNDu 
taruNi tannaya gaNDananu muTTalammade nEre Enu gati tanage hELanammaLallade
    caraNam 3    mane makkaLivarenna tanuvu oDave erdaDu ghanavAgi nambire nannavendu 
anumAnavEtake jIvahOda bhaLika ghana hottu maneyali irisikoLLaro dEva
    caraNam 4    Atma baLalidAga bandhugaLu bandu hottu horagehAku entembaru 
hottu koNDu hOgi agniyali biDisu matte bennanu tirugadale bAhOrallade
    caraNam 5    haraNa hOgada munna hariya sEveya mADi paralOka sAyujya paDedu koNDu 
karuNi krpALu shrI purandara viTTalana nere nambi bhajisi nI sukhiyAgo manujA
